DataElementConcept.preferredName: Transplantation Candidate None Biological Relative HLA Match Tissue Donor
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Transference of a tissue or organ within an individual, between individuals of the same species, or between individuals of different species._Someone or something considered as suitable or likely for something._No person or thing, nobody, not any._A person related by descent rather than by marriage or law._The state when a recipient and their donor have the same alleles for tissue markers. A full match includes HLA-A, HLA-B, HLA-C, and HLA-DRB1. HLA match typing may also include alleles in the HLA-DQ serogroup._Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person.

Concepts.definition: No person or thing, nobody, not any.
A person related by descent rather than by marriage or law.

The state when a recipient and their donor have the same alleles for tissue markers. A full match includes HLA-A, HLA-B, HLA-C, and HLA-DRB1. HLA match typing may also include alleles in the HLA-DQ serogroup.
Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person.
